mapper.select: select * from subject st join subj_type sj on st.type_code= sj.type_code join professor prof on prof.prof_no = st.prof_no join open_subj os on os.subj_code = st.subj_code join registration rs on rs.open_sub_code = os.open_sub_code join student stu on stu.stu_no = rs.stu_no where stu.student_id=#{studentId} and st.semester = '2학기' and st.subj_year = '2021'

select * from evaluation eval left join registration regi on eval.sub_code = regi.open_sub_code left join subj_eval subEval on subEval.open_sub_code = regi.open_sub_code join open_subj opensub on opensub.open_sub_code = regi.open_sub_code join subject subj on subj.subj_code = opensub.subj_code join professor prof on prof.prof_no = subj.prof_no join subj_type suvjt on suvjt.type_code = subj.type_code where regi.stu_no=#{stuNo}
